verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>, for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. As the <S%H354>hart<s%> <S%H6165>panteth<s%> after the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks<s%>, so <S%H6165>panteth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> after thee, O <S%H430>God<s%>.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsteth<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%>, for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>: when shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?
My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have been my <S%H3899>meat<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, while they <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, Where is thy <S%H430>God<s%>?

When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> these things, I pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in me: for I had <S%H5674>gone<s%> with the <S%H5519>multitude<s%>, I <S%H1718>went<s%> with them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise<s%>, with a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> that kept <S%H2287>holyday<s%>.

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> thou in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> him for the <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.

O my <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is cast <S%H7817>down<s%> within me: therefore will I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and of the <S%H2769>Hermonites<s%>, from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar<s%>.

<S%H8415>Deep<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> unto <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of thy <S%H6794>waterspouts<s%>: all thy <S%H4867>waves<s%> and thy <S%H1530>billows<s%> are <S%H5674>gone<s%> over me.

Yet the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be with me, and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>.

I will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me? why <S%H3212>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?
As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, mine <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me; while they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> unto me, Where is thy <S%H430>God<s%>?

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> within me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> thou in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> him, who is the <S%H3444>health<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
